attributes.action: HD for Freeveiw service in the UK and not only for Sky TV service...........
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
High Definition TV should be available on FreeView and NOT sold off to the highest bidder, the spectrum should be set aside for FreeView (BBC, ITV, Channel 4 and Channel 5).
If the spectrum is sold off to the highest bidder - that will mean SKY could be the only UK's only High Definition TV platform and SKY will have the monopoly of the High Definition service in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
